content.rendered:
The Rosella Tub Chair with a Sled Frame has a very modern shape and style; sure to catch the eyes of your customers.

Made with polypropylene shell and beech legs as well as the option of a Grey cushion, you can customise the Rosella chair to suit your environment.

The Rosella works with many of our Dining tables and sofas, to enhance the feel and look of your area.

Also available with 4 wooden legs.

Held in stock for delivery in 3-5 days.

We work closely with a number of fabric & faux leather mills as well as leather dealers so you can customise your chair to suit you.

– Click here to browse Sunbury Design’s Fabric, Faux Leather and Real Leather ranges.

– Click here to browse Panaz’s Fabric and Faux Leather ranges.

– Click here to browse Crest JMT Leather’s range of leathers to suit all budgets!

We do not charge to upholster your chair in custom fabrics, fauxs or leathers, we only charge you what the material costs us, plus a small handling fee; which is included in the total price. If you prefer, you can purchase the material yourself and arrange for it to be delivered to our warehouse.

Please note this item requires some self assembly.
